about.title: About me
about.subTitle: 🤖 Software Engineer | Developer | Backend | Java & Spring Boot Specialist | Quarkus | Microservices | TypeScript | Multicultural IT Experience | Emerging Tech Enthusiast
about.description: Since 2021, I have been on an exciting journey in the world of information technology, specializing in back-end development with a strong focus on Java and Spring Boot. My professional journey is marked by significant experiences in challenging sectors, such as banking/finance, where I had the opportunity to work with high-caliber clients and in diverse teams, extending across cultures and borders, including Chile and Spain.
whatIDoDescription: - Development and maintenance of REST APIs, microservices, and batches.
- Implementation of projects using agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban.
- Creation of efficient solutions using Docker, Git, SQL, JUnit, Kafka, Splunk, AWS, and Azure.
